name: IS-A-TASKHelp
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: is a task help
des: IS-A-TASK Help offers existing clients an easier way to understand how to navigate around the application. Anyone can ask Alexa a question on how to perform a specific action while using IS-A-TASK. We hope this technology integration will allow for an easier, more efficient way to get to know IS-A-TASK.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
